page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: A typical day for me would be to rise at 8.00.At 8.30 I have a breakfast of corn flakes,bread and butter and tea.I leave the house at 8.50 and walk to school. I go to school from Monday to Friday.School starts at{9.00}and finishes at{3.30.}My school day begins with prayers.Then I spend the morning doing English,Maths and project work. Lunchtime is at 12.15 and I go home for lunch. After lunch we have painting,followed by a visit to the gymn.At playtime I enjoy playing at balls with my friends. For the rest of the afternoon we can continue with our projects or play at chess.At 3.30 I go home with my friends.When I get home I usually read an Enid Blyton book until it is time for tea.
